text:
Truckfly | Paris, France | Full stack software engineer | REMOTE, INTERN

Truckfly is building the next generation of tools for the trucking industry. 2 years ago we launched an app for truck drivers, Truckfly, which is used by more than 75k truckers in Europe every month. Last year we launched Dashdoc, a service for trucking companies which is seeing strong growth.

We're looking for our first full time engineer to help us build our apps in React / React Native and Django / DRF.

Salary 40-60kâ‚¬. We're based in Paris but we're happy to talk to you wherever you are :)

Drop us a line at jobs(at)truckfly.com!

Website: https://www.truckfly.com
